headline: Raymond James Welcomes Georgia Advisor Duo Managing Over $190 Million
summary: St. Petersburg, Fla., Sept. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Raymond James (NYSE: RJF) recently welcomed financial advisors Aaron Mabon and Summer Deal to Raymond James Financial Services (RJFS) – the firm’s independent advisor channel – according to Todd Gartrell, Southeast division director for RJFS. Together with Office Manager Lisa Ray, they operate as True North Wealth Advisors, based in LaGrange, Georgia. The group managed approximately $190 million in client assets as part of Commonwealth Fin
